participants: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message:
Hey folks :wave: can we continue to work on this issue so that we can categorize apps? Ideally, we would have this rolled out in the April release and notice beforehand to communicate with customers about which apps belong to which category. https://instabase.atlassian.net/secure/RapidBoard.jspa?rapidView=35&projectKey=CD&modal=detail&selectedIssue=CD-96

cc: @Aaron Vontell @Matt @Jesika Haria @Jessica

No opinions about the classification of apps, but I have some ideas about implementation. Would love to share my thoughts when we get there. I mostly want to see if we can unify the “source of truth” about apps into a single place, with things like metadata, tags, ACLs, etc.

@georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire any specific action items for that Jira task? Any specific edits we should look to make? (Personally I can see us deprecating Entity Extraction, Data Manager, and maybe Report)
I see the discussion in the comments now, disregard!
